name: Sandbox
author: [slem]
description: This mod will add a little tab to your game, what is it for? It adds some options for a sandbox experience such as giving yourself items, money, experience and more! I actively will add suggestions to the mod. P.S. - I am not responsible if your computer explodes or anything happens to your save file! You can help develop the mod here: https://github.com/sleme/sandbox-mod
